solution_line_template: Since 1 hour is equal to {minutes_in_hour} minutes, then {time_minutes} minutes is equal to {time_minutes}/{minutes_in_hour} = <<{time_minutes}/{minutes_in_hour}={time_hours}>>{time_hours} hours.
Then, the speed in kilometers per hour is {distance_km} km/{time_hours} hour = {speed_kmph} kilometers per hour.
